name: UnderOneRoof
description:
(Using translator)

This short game has fewer interactions and a longer textual storyline.

#This is a 2D pixel style storyline game born in RPGMaker.
#Players need to obtain more scene information and advance the main plot through simple mobile clicks, facing the truth that has been unraveled.


Self rating: 6/10

—— Bilibili：危途异客
